ancillaries.colour_text: An exquisite sword forged from minerals found in the sea; no matter its wielder, no enemy will get a clean blow.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The sword of swords, created by the Skaven to destroy the greatest Necromancer to ever walk the world. It is a doomed thing.

ancillaries.colour_text: The sword of swords, created by the Skaven to destroy the greatest Necromancer to ever walk the world. It is a doomed thing.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This weapon is inlaid with a thousand tiny barbed teeth, that still require feeding!

ancillaries.colour_text: This weapon is inlaid with a thousand tiny barbed teeth, that still require feeding!

ancillaries.colour_text: Legend has it that the Star Lance strikes with the wrath of a Star Dragon, and cannot be unmade while the drakes still live upon Ulthuan.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A legendary blade forged by Aren, one of the first Swordmasters of Hoeth. It is as tall as an Elf and as light as a willow switch.

ancillaries.colour_text: A legendary blade forged by Aren, one of the first Swordmasters of Hoeth. It is as tall as an Elf and as light as a willow switch.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Quenched in the poison of a thousand malicious serpents; when it strikes, poison flows into the veins of its victims.

ancillaries.colour_text: Quenched in the poison of a thousand malicious serpents; when it strikes, poison flows into the veins of its victims.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This weapon is attached to a Warp-generator that channels crackling energy along its blade.

ancillaries.colour_text: This weapon is attached to a Warp-generator that channels crackling energy along its blade.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Warpstone powder mixed with steel during the forging process creates a weapon of wicked cutting prowess.

ancillaries.colour_text: Warpstone powder mixed with steel during the forging process creates a weapon of wicked cutting prowess.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This weapon weeps a corrosive venom that can melt through armour to help deliver the poisoned point.

ancillaries.colour_text: This weapon weeps a corrosive venom that can melt through armour to help deliver the poisoned point.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Whenever the God of the Savage Hunt's name is invoked blood shall flow, one way or another.

ancillaries.colour_text: Whenever the God of the Savage Hunt's name is invoked blood shall flow, one way or another.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Some Marauders walk openly within the lands of other races, not seen as a threat but a northern foreigner - a barbarian. But they are wrong, he is a threat.

ancillaries.colour_text: Some Marauders walk openly within the lands of other races, not seen as a threat but a northern foreigner - a barbarian. But they are wrong, he is a threat.

colour_text.last_approved_text: There are many monsters in the northern wastes - creatures that will eat a man no matter which god he worships. A tribe's Beast Tamer can bring such monsters to heel… if he has the talent.

ancillaries.colour_text: There are many monsters in the northern wastes - creatures that will eat a man no matter which god he worships. A tribe's Beast Tamer can bring such monsters to heel… if he has the talent.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Some nobles of the mortal nations - the rich ones - take to buying antiquities and cursed items. Their ignorance in unearthing such relics is our ally.

colour_text.last_approved_text: The servants of Chaos are more than the barbarous Northmen - throughout the mortal realms secret cults worship the true Gods, and so our plans advance.

ancillaries.colour_text: The servants of Chaos are more than the barbarous Northmen - throughout the mortal realms secret cults worship the true Gods, and so our plans advance.
